column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=My family moved into a new house and we wanted to plant a year to celebrate our new beginning .
#id=2
#text=We knew that the tree would grow over the years and would be a great reminder of how long we had lived there .
#id=3
#text=We chose a spot in our yard where the tree would have plenty of space to grow .
#id=4
#text=My dad brought out some shovels and we all helped to dig a big hole .
#id=5
#text=The tree was not very large yet , but the ball of roots at the bottom made it very heavy .
#id=6
#text=We all helped Dad lift the tree and carry it over to the hole .
#id=7
#text=We placed it in gently , being very careful not to damage the roots or the branches .
#id=8
#text=We threw some fertilizer into the hole to feed the tree and then we started to refill the hole with the dirt we had dug out .
#id=9
#text=We made sure the tree was nice and straight and standing tall and then began patting down the dirt .
#text=When it was finished we turned on the hose and gave it plenty of water .
